fields.label: Data Source Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the datasource from which this indexer reads data.

fields.label: Target Index Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the index to which this indexer writes data.

fields.label: Skillset Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the skillset executing with this indexer.

fields.label: Disabled
fields.tooltip: A value indicating whether the indexer is disabled. Default is false.

fields.label: Field Mappings
fields.tooltip: Defines mappings between fields in the data source and corresponding target fields in the index.

fields.label: Output Field Mappings
fields.tooltip: Output field mappings are applied after enrichment and immediately before indexing.

fields.label: Cache
fields.tooltip: Adds caching to an enrichment pipeline to allow for incremental modification steps without having to rebuild the index every time.

fields.label: Encryption Key
fields.tooltip: A description of an encryption key that you create in Azure Key Vault.
